name: Curse N' Brew
description:
Brew magical potions to  escape monsters and lift the forest's curse !

Curse N' Brew is a short game where you need to free the spooky forest from it's curse while you are chased by spooky monsters. Use the ingredients you find lying around to brew potions to help you and you might survive !

Controls :
  • WASD / Arrows     -     Move around
  • Mouse     -     Look around
  • Mouse wheel     -     Choose item
  • Left click / Right click     -     Interact / Use item
  • Escape     -     Quit
Notes :

Game made in Unreal Engine 4 in about 6 weeks.

While I have made lots of small prototypes in the past, this is the first completed game that I publish to the "Open world of the public internet".

DO criticize my game ! You only get better by learning from your mistakes. Every piece of criticism is a step towards the better !

The game is short right now. I will very likely expand it further with new levels and content if some people like it. But I believe it is important to test out the idea first before spending too much time expanding.

I sincerely hope you will have fun playing what I had fun making !   :D
